content: fleur is a stylish and practical hanging basket it can be used as an odds and ends organiser or as shown pop a cute faux succulent pot in it for an on trend decorator piece requirements 75m of 12 ply yarn or you can double strand an 8ply/dk yarn sample shown is moda vera egerton twist 5mm hook darning needle stitch marker abbreviations us terms chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet skp skip
